title: Laying a Marine Cable
plot: The recent laying of the telegraphic cable under the sea calls to mind the wonderful achievements of telegraphy and the first laying of the Morse Atlantic Cable from America to Europe, connecting the Western with the Eastern hemisphere. The unwinding and laying of 3,000 miles of cable under and across the Atlantic Ocean, Is a gigantic and marvelous achievement, almost incomprehensible, but all made quite clear in this remarkable educational film.
tagline: See the actual laying of an Atlantic cable. It is very interesting and instructive. (Print Ad- Binghamton Press, ((Binghamton, NY)) 15 April 1913)
